languages.text: Много дней мы прорывались в стальное чрево мануфакторума. На третью неделю наступления передовые отряды были остановлены и сметены залпом плазменных макропушек. В нарушение всех канонов священной инженерии еретики водрузили остов недостроенного пустотного крейсера на многокилометровые гусеницы. Сей левиафан из адамантиума и пластали перекрыл нам путь.

traits.locale_text: День за днем мы прорывались в стальное чрево мануфакторума. На третью неделю наступления нас встретил залп из плазменной макропушки боевого крейсера Эксплораторов. Еретики поставили недостроенный корабль длиной в десять километров на гусеницы, перекрыв нам путь.

languages.text: It took us many days to break through to the metal heart of the manufactorum. In the third week of the assault, the vanguard was halted and swept away by a salvo of plasma macro-cannons. Scorning every canon of sacred engineering, the heretics had placed the hull of an unfinished void cruiser on treads several kilometres long. This leviathan of adamantine and plasteel barred our way.
languages.original_text: Много дней мы прорывались в стальное чрево мануфакторума. На третью неделю наступления передовые отряды были остановлены и сметены залпом плазменных макропушек. В нарушение всех канонов священной инженерии еретики водрузили остов недостроенного пустотного крейсера на многокилометровые гусеницы. Сей левиафан из адамантиума и пластали перекрыл нам путь.

traits.locale_text: It took us many days to break through to the metal heart of the manufactorum. On the third week of the assault, the vanguard was halted and swept away by a salvo of plasma macro-cannons. Scorning every canon of sacred engineering, the heretics had placed the hull of an unfinished void cruiser on treads several kilometres long. This leviathan of adamantium and plasteel barred our way.

It took us many days to break through to the metal heart of the manufactorum. On the third week of the assault, the vanguard was halted and swept away by a salvo of plasma macro-cannons. Scorning every canon of sacred engineering, the heretics had placed the hull of an unfinished void cruiser on treads several kilometres long. This leviathan of adamantium and plasteel barred our way.

Scorning every canon of sacred engineering, the heretics had placed the hull of an unfinished void cruiser on treads several kilometres long. This leviathan of adamantium and plasteel barred our way.

It took us many days to break through to the metal heart of the manufactorum. On the third week of the assault, the vanguard was halted and swept away by a salvo of plasma macro-cannons. Scorning every canon of sacred engineering, the heretics had placed the hull of an unfinished void cruiser on treads several kilometres long. This leviathan of adamantium and plasteel barred our way.

It took us many days to break through to the metal heart of the manufactorum. In the third week of the assault, the vanguard was halted and swept away by a salvo of plasma macro-cannons. Scorning every canon of sacred engineering, the heretics had placed the hull of an unfinished void cruiser on treads several kilometres long. This leviathan of adamantine and plasteel barred our way.

It took us many days to break through to the metal heart of the manufactorum. In the third week of the assault, the vanguard was halted and swept away by a salvo of plasma macro-cannons. Scorning every canon of sacred engineering, the heretics had placed the hull of an unfinished void cruiser on treads several kilometres long. This leviathan of adamantine and plasteel barred our way.

languages.text: 我们花了很多天时间，才终于突破了制造工厂的金属心脏。当这场战役持续到第三周时，我们的先锋队遭到了敌人等离子宏炮的齐射攻击，被瞬间歼灭。那些异端分子把一艘尚未建造完成的虚空巡洋舰舰体当做炮台，放置在长达几公里的履带上，仿佛要将神圣工程学的所有信条碾碎一般。这艘由精金与塑钢构成的庞然大物，瞬间挡住了我们前进的道路。
languages.original_text: It took us many days to break through to the metal heart of the manufactorum. In the third week of the assault, the vanguard was halted and swept away by a salvo of plasma macro-cannons. Scorning every canon of sacred engineering, the heretics had placed the hull of an unfinished void cruiser on treads several kilometres long. This leviathan of adamantine and plasteel barred our way.

traits.locale_text: 我们花了很多天时间，才终于突破了制造工厂的金属心脏。当这场战役持续到第三周时，我们的先锋队遭到了敌人等离子宏炮的齐射攻击，被瞬间歼灭。那些异端分子把一艘尚未建造完成的虚空巡洋舰舰体当做炮台，放置在长达几公里的履带上，仿佛要将神圣工程学的所有信条碾碎一般。这艘由精金与塑钢构成的庞然大物，瞬间挡住了我们前进的道路。

languages.text: Il nous a fallu plusieurs jours pour enfin accéder au cœur métallique du manufactorum. La troisième semaine de l'assaut, l'avant-garde a été balayée par une salve de macro-canons à plasma. Au mépris de toutes les règles d'ingénierie sacrée, les hérétiques avaient placé la coque d'un croiseur en construction sur des chenilles longues de plusieurs kilomètres. Ce mastodonte d'adamantine et de plastacier nous barrait la route.
languages.original_text: It took us many days to break through to the metal heart of the manufactorum. In the third week of the assault, the vanguard was halted and swept away by a salvo of plasma macro-cannons. Scorning every canon of sacred engineering, the heretics had placed the hull of an unfinished void cruiser on treads several kilometres long. This leviathan of adamantine and plasteel barred our way.

traits.locale_text: Il nous a fallu plusieurs jours pour enfin accéder au cœur métallique du manufactorum. La troisième semaine de l'assaut, l'avant-garde a été balayée par une salve de macro-canons à plasma. Au mépris de toutes les règles d'ingénierie sacrée, les hérétiques avaient placé la coque d'un croiseur en construction sur des chenilles longues de plusieurs kilomètres. Ce mastodonte d'adamantium et de plastacier nous barrait la route.

languages.text: 聖工場の金属の心臓部まで突破するのに何日もかかった。襲撃開始から3週目、前衛はプラズママクロキャノンの一斉射撃によって足止めされ、一掃された。聖なる工学のあらゆる規範を無視し、異端者たちは未完成のヴォイド船の船体を数キロの長さのトレッドの上に置いた。アダマンチウムとプラスチールでできた巨大な船体が、我々の行く手を阻んだ。
languages.original_text: It took us many days to break through to the metal heart of the manufactorum. In the third week of the assault, the vanguard was halted and swept away by a salvo of plasma macro-cannons. Scorning every canon of sacred engineering, the heretics had placed the hull of an unfinished void cruiser on treads several kilometres long. This leviathan of adamantine and plasteel barred our way.

traits.locale_text: 聖工場の金属の心臓部まで突破するのに何日もかかった。襲撃開始から3週目、前衛はプラズママクロキャノンの一斉射撃によって足止めされ、一掃された。聖なる工学のあらゆる規範を無視し、異端者たちは未完成のヴォイド船の船体を数キロの長さのトレッドの上に置いた。アダマンチウムとプラスチールでできた巨大な船体が、我々の行く手を阻んだ。

languages.text: Tardamos varios días en llegar al corazón mecánico del manufactorum. En la tercera semana del asalto, la vanguardia tuvo que detenerse cuando una andanada de macrocañones de plasma causó estragos. Burlándose de todos los cánones de la ingeniería sagrada, los herejes habían colocado el casco de un crucero del vacío inacabado sobre orugas kilométricas. Este leviatán de adamantino y plastiacero nos impedía pasar.
languages.original_text: It took us many days to break through to the metal heart of the manufactorum. In the third week of the assault, the vanguard was halted and swept away by a salvo of plasma macro-cannons. Scorning every canon of sacred engineering, the heretics had placed the hull of an unfinished void cruiser on treads several kilometres long. This leviathan of adamantine and plasteel barred our way.

traits.locale_text: Tardamos varios días en llegar al corazón mecánico del manufactorum. En la tercera semana del asalto, la vanguardia tuvo que detenerse cuando una andanada de macrocañones de plasma causó estragos. Burlándose de todos los cánones de la ingeniería sagrada, los herejes habían colocado el casco de un crucero del vacío inacabado sobre orugas kilométricas. Este leviatán de adamantio y plastiacero nos impedía pasar.

languages.text: Es dauerte viele Tage, zum metallenen Herzen des Manufactorums vorzudringen. In der dritten Woche des Angriffs wurde die Vorhut von einer Salve aus Plasma-Makrokanonen aufgehalten und fortgefegt. In völliger Verhöhnung aller Grundsätze der heiligen Ingenieurskunst hatten die Ketzer den Rumpf eines unfertigen Leerekreuzers auf mehrere Kilometer lange Ketten gesetzt. Dieser Leviathan aus Adamant und Plaststahl versperrte uns den Weg.
languages.original_text: It took us many days to break through to the metal heart of the manufactorum. In the third week of the assault, the vanguard was halted and swept away by a salvo of plasma macro-cannons. Scorning every canon of sacred engineering, the heretics had placed the hull of an unfinished void cruiser on treads several kilometres long. This leviathan of adamantine and plasteel barred our way.

traits.locale_text: Es dauerte viele Tage, zum metallenen Herzen des Manufactorums vorzudringen. In der dritten Woche des Angriffs wurde die Vorhut von einer Salve aus Plasma-Makrokanonen aufgehalten und fortgefegt. In völliger Verhöhnung aller Grundsätze der heiligen Ingenieurskunst hatten die Ketzer den Rumpf eines unfertigen Leerekreuzers auf mehrere Kilometer lange Ketten gesetzt. Dieser Leviathan aus Adamantium und Plaststahl versperrte uns den Weg.

languages.text: Manufaktorumun metal kalbine ulaşmamız çok zaman aldı. Taarruzun üçüncü haftasında öncüler duraksadı ve makro toplardan gelen bir plazma salvosu tarafından yok edildiler. Kutsal mühendislik nizamnamesine gram saygısı olmayan kâfirler; tamamlanmamış bir uçsuz gemisinin gövdesini, birkaç kilometrelik bir hat boyunca yerleştirmişti. Adamantin ve plasçelikten oluşan bu azman, yolumuzu kapatıyordu.
languages.original_text: It took us many days to break through to the metal heart of the manufactorum. In the third week of the assault, the vanguard was halted and swept away by a salvo of plasma macro-cannons. Scorning every canon of sacred engineering, the heretics had placed the hull of an unfinished void cruiser on treads several kilometres long. This leviathan of adamantine and plasteel barred our way.
